Charles Heinrich

  1. Foster Name: Charles P.
  2. Foster Family: H. R. Gordon
  3. Location of Family: Sterling, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Sterling, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 5
  7. Date of Birth: 6/17/1902, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 6/9/1983, Sterling, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Sterling Sun, 9 October 1908; 1930 United States Federal Census; Social Security Death Index; Johnson County Courier, 16 June 1983.
